mapper.sql: select b.book_id, b.list_list_id, b.title, s.key_name, b.insert_date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' as insert_date, b.last_update_date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' as last_update_date, b.last_chapter, bt.key_name as type_name from lists.books b inner join lists.statuses s on s."STATUS_ID"= b.status_status_id left outer join lists.book_types bt on bt.type_id = b.type_type_id
mapper.select: select max(book_id)+1 as res from lists.books
mapper.insert: insert into lists.books(book_id, list_list_id, status_status_id, insert_date, last_update_date, title, last_chapter, type_type_id) values(#{bookId}, #{readListId},#{statusId}, #{insertDate}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{title}, #{lastChapter}, #{bookTypeId})
